customers.description: Customer information including name, email, city, and registration date

products.description: Product catalog with names, prices, categories, and stock levels

orders.description: Order transactions with customer, product, amount, and status

categories.description: Product categories (Electronics, Clothing, Furniture, Books, Groceries)

users.description: System users with roles (admin, staff, manager)

payments.description: Payment records with methods (card, upi, netbanking, cod)

reviews.description: Product reviews with ratings and comments

chat_history.description: Chat conversation history from the analytics interface
